price: Bali utawafikia kwa ghafla, na utawashitua na wala hawataweza kuurudisha, wala hawatapewa muhula!
arabic: بَلۡ تَأۡتِيهِم بَغۡتَةٗ فَتَبۡهَتُهُمۡ فَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ رَدَّهَا وَلَا هُمۡ يُنظَرُونَ
footnotes: Kiyama hakiwajii kwa kukitarajia kutokea kwake, bali kitawazukia kwa ghafla tu kiwababaishe, wasiweze kukirudisha, wala wao hawatapewa muhula wa kutubia na kutafuta udhuru kwa waliyo kwisha yatenda..

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: bal tatīhim baghtatan fatabhatuhum falā yastaṭīʿūna raddahā walā hum yunẓarūna
